name: Maganomoto
description:
Divide into three teams and fight.
The team that first beat 30 players wins.

<Story>
A lot of ghosts appeared in a certain mountain.
We need to get ready to fight the ghost.
Fight with our friends and train each other!

At present, only the team battle mode implemented.
The difficulty is divided into Easy, Normal, and Hard.

<Operation method>
Look at the signboard in the game.

<Other>
This game will continue to develop.
